description: An extremely thick cream that will "enchance your resilience to the deleterious effects of XE037 overexposure" if you rub it on your skin.  It smells like nail polish somehow gone rotten, and even touching it makes your fingertips itch terribly.

use_action.description: Rub the cream on your skin.

description: A faintly-glowing green liquid, the document you found told you that this would "restore your morphology to baseline", whatever that means.
